```{.r .cell-code}
#2.3.3
popdata <- read_csv("Data/Aspatial/Residential Survey/respopagesextod2011to2020.csv")
summary(popdata)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
      PA                 SZ                 AG                Sex           
 Length:984656      Length:984656      Length:984656      Length:984656     
 Class :character   Class :character   Class :character   Class :character  
 Mode  :character   Mode  :character   Mode  :character   Mode  :character  
                                                                            
                                                                            
                                                                            
     TOD                 Pop               Time     
 Length:984656      Min.   :   0.00   Min.   :2011  
 Class :character   1st Qu.:   0.00   1st Qu.:2013  
 Mode  :character   Median :   0.00   Median :2016  
                    Mean   :  39.86   Mean   :2016  
                    3rd Qu.:  10.00   3rd Qu.:2018  
                    Max.   :2860.00   Max.   :2020  
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#2.3.4
popdata2020 <- popdata %>%
  filter(Time == 2020) %>%
  group_by(PA, SZ, AG) %>%
  summarise(`POP` = sum(`Pop`)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = AG, values_from = POP) %>%
  mutate(YOUNG = rowSums(.[3:6]) + 
           rowSums(.[12])) %>% 
  mutate(`ECONOMY ACTIVE` = rowSums(.[7:11]) + 
           rowSums(.[13:15])) %>% 
  mutate(`AGED` = rowSums(.[16:21])) %>% 
  mutate(`TOTAL` = rowSums(.[3:21])) %>% 
  mutate(`DEPENDENCY` = (`YOUNG` + `AGED`) / (`ECONOMY ACTIVE`)) %>% 
  select(`PA`, `SZ`, `YOUNG`, `ECONOMY ACTIVE`, `AGED`, `TOTAL`, `DEPENDENCY`)

popdata2020 <- popdata2020 %>% 
  mutate_at(.vars = vars(PA, SZ), .funs = list(toupper)) %>%
  filter(`ECONOMY ACTIVE` > 0)

mpsz_pop2020 <- left_join(mpsz, popdata2020, by = c("SUBZONE_N" = "SZ"))

write_rds(mpsz_pop2020, "Data/Geospatial/mpszpop2020.rds")
```
:::


#2.4


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
#2.4.1
tmap_mode("plot")

qtm(mpsz_pop2020, fill = "DEPENDENCY")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-On_Exercise_02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#2.4.2
tm_shape(mpsz_pop2020) + 
  tm_fill("DEPENDENCY", style = "quantile", palette = "Blues", title = "Dependency ratio") + 
  tm_layout(main.title = "Distribution of Dependency Ratio by planning subzone", main.title.position = "center", main.title.size = 1.2, legend.height = 0.45, legend.width = 0.35, frame = TRUE) +
  tm_borders(alpha = 0.5) +
  tm_compass(type="8star", size = 2) +
  tm_scale_bar() +
  tm_grid(alpha = 0.2) +
  tm_credits("Source: Planning Sub-zone boundary from Urban Redevelopment Authorithy (URA)\n and Population data from Department of Statistics DOS", position = c("left", "bottom"))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-On_Exercise_02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-2.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
tm_shape(mpsz_pop2020) +
  tm_polygons()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-On_Exercise_02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-3.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
tm_shape(mpsz_pop2020) +
  tm_polygons("DEPENDENCY")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-On_Exercise_02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-4.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
tm_shape(mpsz_pop2020) +

```

:::


![](Hands-On_Exercise_02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-6.png){width=672}

```{.r .cell-code}
  tm_fill("DEPENDENCY", n = 5, style = "jenks") +

```

![](Hands-On_Exercise_02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-7.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
tm_shape(mpsz_pop2020) +
  tm_fill("DEPENDENCY", n = 5, style = "equal") +

```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-On_Exercise_02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-8.png){width=672}


```{.r .cell-code}
#2.4.5
tm_shape(mpsz_pop2020) +
  tm_fill("DEPENDENCY", style = "jenks", palette = "Blues", legend.hist = TRUE, legend.is.portrait = TRUE, legend.hist.z = 0.1) +
  tm_layout(main.title = "Distribution of Dependency Ratio by planning subzone \n(Jenks classification)", main.title.position = "center", main.title.size = 1, legend.height = 0.45, legend.width = 0.35, legend.outside = FALSE, legend.position = c("right", "bottom"), frame = FALSE) +
  tm_borders(alpha = 0.5)
```

![](Hands-On_Exercise_02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-12.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
tm_shape(mpsz_pop2020) +
  tm_fill("DEPENDENCY", style = "quantile", palette = "-Greens") +
  tm_borders(alpha = 0.5) +
  tmap_style("classic")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-On_Exercise_02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-13.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
tm_shape(mpsz_pop2020) +
  tm_fill("DEPENDENCY", style = "quantile", palette = "Blues", title = "No. of persons") +
  tm_layout(main.title = "Distribution of Dependency Ratio \nby planning subzone", main.title.position = "center", main.title.size = 1.2, legend.height = 0.45, legend.width = 0.35, frame = TRUE) +
  tm_borders(alpha = 0.5) +
  tm_compass(type = "8star", size = 2) +
  tm_scale_bar(width = 0.15) +
  tm_grid(lwd = 0.1, alpha = 0.2) +
  tm_credits("Source: Planning Sub-zone boundary from Urban Redevelopment Authorithy (URA)\n and Population data from Department of Statistics DOS", position = c("left", "bottom"))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-On_Exercise_02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-14.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
tmap_style("white")

#2.4.6
tm_shape(mpsz_pop2020) + 
  tm_fill(c("YOUNG", "AGED"), style = "equal", palette = "Blues") +
  tm_layout(legend.position = c("right", "bottom")) +
  tm_borders(alpha = 0.5) +
  tmap_style("white")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-On_Exercise_02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-15.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
tm_shape(mpsz_pop2020) + 
  tm_polygons(c("DEPENDENCY","AGED"), style = c("equal", "quantile"), palette = list("Blues","Greens")) +
  tm_layout(legend.position = c("right", "bottom"))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-On_Exercise_02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-16.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
tm_shape(mpsz_pop2020) +
  tm_fill("DEPENDENCY", style = "quantile", palette = "Blues", thres.poly = 0) + 
  tm_facets(by = "REGION_N", free.coords = TRUE, drop.shapes = TRUE) +
  tm_layout(legend.show = FALSE, title.position = c("center", "center"), title.size = 20) +
  tm_borders(alpha = 0.5)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-On_Exercise_02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-17.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
youngmap <- tm_shape(mpsz_pop2020) + 
  tm_polygons("YOUNG", style = "quantile", palette = "Blues")

agedmap <- tm_shape(mpsz_pop2020) + 
  tm_polygons("AGED", style = "quantile", palette = "Blues")

tmap_arrange(youngmap, agedmap, asp = 1, ncol = 2)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-On_Exercise_02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-18.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#2.4.7
tm_shape(mpsz_pop2020[mpsz_pop2020$REGION_N == "CENTRAL REGION", ]) +
  tm_fill("DEPENDENCY", style = "quantile", palette = "Blues", legend.hist = TRUE, legend.is.portrait = TRUE, legend.hist.z = 0.1) +
  tm_layout(legend.outside = TRUE, legend.height = 0.45, legend.width = 5.0, legend.position = c("right", "bottom"), frame = FALSE) +
  tm_borders(alpha = 0.5)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-On_Exercise_02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-19.png){width=672}
:::
